title: Pourmoi
description: Pourmoi is an online food ordering platform that allows users to place meal orders or create offers for restaurants. After placing an order, users receive a digital token for easy pickup. The platform simplifies restaurant operations by enabling administrators to manage categories, menu items, and orders efficiently, with secure payment integration for a smooth user experience.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained backend APIs using Node.js, Express, and TypeScript
Designed and managed database schemas using Prisma ORM with MongoDB
Implemented JWT-based authentication and authorization for users and admins
Integrated Stripe for secure online payments and order processing
Built endpoints for food ordering, token generation, and restaurant management
Worked closely with the frontend team to ensure seamless API integration and performance
Optimized server logic and data handling to improve response time and scalability
features: Simple and efficient food ordering and token-based pickup system
Automatic token generation after successful order placement
Admin panel for category, menu, and order management
Secure payment integration using Stripe
Responsive and user-friendly restaurant management workflow

title: Profit Doctor
description: Profit Doctor is a professional consulting platform in the field of aesthetic medicine. Its mission is to empower aesthetic clinics and private equity partners with expert consulting, operational optimization, and strategic growth guidance. The platform simplifies client engagement with features like online appointment booking, admin management, and detailed treatment information.
responsibilities: Developed and deployed both frontend and backend of the platform
Built responsive and SEO-friendly frontend using Next.js
Implemented animations and smooth user interactions for a professional UI experience
Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express, and TypeScript
Integrated MongoDB with Prisma ORM for efficient and structured database management
Implemented JWT-based authentication for secure user and admin access
Integrated Stripe for online payment handling and appointment booking
Collaborated with the design and consulting teams to ensure user-friendly workflows and data accuracy
features: Online appointment booking system with admin confirmation
Comprehensive service listings for aesthetic treatments
Secure authentication and user management
Payment integration for consultation and service bookings
Responsive, user-friendly interface for desktop and mobile devices

title: Abroad App
description: Abroad is a travel companion app designed to help users record, organize, and relive their journeys. From tracking visited countries to managing trips, journals, and personal travel data, Abroad provides a seamless experience for travelers who want to keep their adventures organized and memorable.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained backend services using Node.js, Express, and TypeScript
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for trip, journal, and profile management
Integrated Prisma ORM with MongoDB for efficient data modeling and queries
Implemented secure authentication and authorization using JWT
Built endpoints for world map tracking and travel history data synchronization
Integrated payment handling using Stripe for premium travel features
Collaborated with frontend and mobile teams to ensure smooth API integration and performance
features: World Map Tracking: View all visited countries highlighted in vibrant colors
Trip Management: Add, edit, or delete trips effortlessly
Personal Journal: Record and update travel memories anytime
Country Highlights: Display visited countries with colorful markers and map icons
Profile & Info: Manage personal travel details with ease
Travel History: Keep a complete log of all explored destinations

title: ProBanesa
description: ProBanesa is a comprehensive building management platform designed for administrators, residents, and businesses to simplify operations, communication, and compliance in residential complexes. It streamlines everything from managing payments and sending notifications to maintaining centralized building data — all within one secure platform.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained backend APIs using Node.js, Express, and TypeScript
Designed database schemas and models using Prisma ORM with MongoDB
Implemented secure authentication and authorization using JWT
Integrated Stripe for automated monthly billing and payment management
Built automated monthly report generation and email delivery system for admins
Optimized backend performance and ensured scalability for multi-building management
Collaborated closely with frontend and mobile teams to ensure smooth API integration
features: Administrators create accounts, register buildings, and invite residents
Residents sign up and complete their profiles for a personalized experience
Automatic monthly report generation and email delivery to administrators
Simplified payment management, notifications, and two-way communication
Centralized data storage for buildings, residents, and businesses
Accurate records for all user types with secure data access

title: Neo Wash
description: Neo Wash a comprehensive car service management app. Where users can book car services, track service history, and manage appointments. Traditional car washes rely on water tanks, pressure washers, generators, and pumps — tools that are not only inefficient and expensive but can also cause damage to your vehicle, harm the environment, and pose risks to human health.
role: Backend Developer & Frontend Developer(Only Admin Panel)
responsibilities: Developed the backend architecture using Node.js, Express, and TypeScript
Integrated MongoDB with Prisma ORM for efficient database operations
Implemented authentication and authorization using JWT
Integrated Stripe for secure online payments
Built the admin dashboard for managing services, bundles, addons, and bookings
Implemented slot-based booking and real-time service status updates
features: Admin panel for service, bundle & addon management
Slot-based booking with real-time schedule management
Push notifications for reminders & engagement
Push notifications for reminders & engagement
Live booking status updates and service tracking
Complete vehicle service history & maintenance tracking
Secure payment integration with multiple options

title: Town'ZZ
description: Town'ZZ is a dynamic event discovery and management app that connects users with local cultural, musical, artistic, and sporting events. It allows residents to find activities nearby and event creators to easily promote their events. The platform offers seamless event creation, ticketing, and secure payment processing for a smooth experience.
responsibilities: Developed the backend system using Node.js, Express, and TypeScript
Implemented secure authentication and authorization with JWT
Designed and integrated APIs for event creation, booking, and ticket management
Integrated Stripe for payment and ticket handling
Developed the admin dashboard to manage users, events, and payments
Used Prisma ORM with MongoDB for efficient data modeling and management
Ensured API scalability and performance optimization
features: Quick search for events around you using geolocation
Intuitive and modern interface for an optimal user experience
Simplified ticket and payment management through Stripe integration
Easily publish your events with descriptions and photos
Gain visibility with a local and active audience

title: My Guo
description: MyGUO is an innovative AI-powered Web3 platform that provides real-time insights, wallet analysis, and predictive market trends. It features tools like Wallet Intelligence, Historical Analysis, and Market Insights to help users make data-driven investment decisions. Through the 'Ask Guo Anything' feature, users can interact with an intelligent AI agent for personalized insights, creating an engaging and futuristic user experience.
responsibilities: Developed a modern and responsive frontend using Next.js
Designed an interactive user interface for AI-powered insights and analytics
Implemented smooth page transitions and animations for better UX
Integrated dynamic data visualization components for wallet and market analysis
Optimized frontend performance for faster rendering and improved user experience
features: Interactive and responsive frontend built with Next.js
Engaging UI for real-time AI interactions
Dynamic data visualization for wallet behavior and market insights
Seamless user experience with modern design principles

title: Nutrigenix
description: Nutrigenix is a frontend-only project designed as an interactive, terminal-style web experience. It mimics a command-line interface with smooth typing animations and dynamic transitions, providing users with an engaging and visually appealing experience. The project is built entirely with Next.js and enhanced with animation libraries.
responsibilities: Developed a responsive and interactive frontend using Next.js
Implemented typing animations to simulate a terminal environment
Integrated Framer Motion for smooth UI transitions and animations
Used AOS (Animate On Scroll) to enhance scroll-based interactions
Optimized frontend performance for better loading and animation smoothness
features: Frontend designed with interactive UI using Next.js and Framer Motion
AOS (Animate On Scroll) enhances scrolling experience with delightful animations

description: A new website powered by React and Node.js, featuring captivating animations with Framer Motion and AOS. It ensures a seamless user experience with smooth navigation and dynamic content updates.
